Package cz.cvut.fel.omo.smarthome.model.concreteAppliances

Class Ventilation

java.lang.Object
cz.cvut.fel.omo.smarthome.model.abstractEntities.HouseholdItem
cz.cvut.fel.omo.smarthome.model.abstractEntities.Appliance
cz.cvut.fel.omo.smarthome.model.concreteAppliances.Ventilation
All Implemented Interfaces:
PowerConsumption, Observer, ApplianceInterface, Element
public class Ventilation extends Appliance
Represents a concrete Ventilation System appliance (e.g., smart fan, extractor, or air handler) in the smart home.

This appliance actively manages air quality and humidity by switching its state (ON/OFF) based on internal events like cooking, showering, or emergencies.

  • Constructor Details

    • Ventilation

      public Ventilation(String name, String manufacturer, String model, Room room)
      Constructs a new Ventilation appliance.
      Parameters:
      name - The name of the ventilation unit (e.g., "Kitchen Extractor Fan").
      manufacturer - The manufacturer.
      model - The model.
      room - The room where the ventilation system is installed.

  • Method Details

    • processEvent

      protected void processEvent(Event event)
      Processes events relevant to air quality and emergency response.

      It handles:

      • FIRE_ALARM: Turns ON ventilation immediately (if safe to do so, depending on design) or may be linked to other systems.
      • SHOWERING: Turns ON to remove humidity (e.g., in a bathroom).
      • TIME_TO_COOK: Turns ON to remove smoke/odors (e.g., in a kitchen).
      Uses helper methods to change the appliance state (turning ON ventilation).
      Specified by:
      processEvent in class Appliance
      Parameters:
      event - The event to process.
